Reviews.Title: Great little Samsung
Reviews.Author: Sandy "Sandylns"
Reviews.Content: This is a fine camera, Has a nice feel to it, Not a battery hog. One drawback is that it will not accept SDHC cards just the standard SD. Having said that, it will take a 4gb SD card. More than enough for hundreds of pictures. The screen is clear and the controls are easy to use. As for picture quality, it is excellent. This model has been upgraded to the S1050. Not much difference except that that camera takes SDHC

Reviews.Title: battery eater
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: the camera is good, but it goes through batteries very fast, I would get rechargeable ones if you get this camera. I mean every time you use it you need new batteries.
